message.body: Dad told me he cried when he found out the dog was lost
That's what he said. After you fell asleep aha

Dude I cried. Cuz like the puppy wanted to come in the bathroom with me but since dad was home I was like go downstairs and play with dad and he just looked at me all sad and when I got out of the shower Kelly had already picked him up:(
Awh :( I just feel shifty cause I knew he didn't really like Kelly. he was too shy with her. But I thought it was cute god I'm dumb af
Dude. We're all dumb. I never thought he'd ever run away. But he did so.
